name: Modern Sofa
description: A stylish and comfortable modern sofa, perfect for any living room. Made from high-quality fabric and solid wood frame, ensuring durability and elegance.

name: Wooden Dining Table
description: A solid oak dining table with a natural wood finish. Seats up to six people, making it ideal for family gatherings and dinner parties.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Designed for maximum comfort and support, this ergonomic office chair features adjustable armrests, lumbar support, and breathable mesh backrest.
